orruptor, was the favored weapon of Gargauth, the Faer√ªnian god of political corruption.
Corruptor was a powerful enchanted +3 returning throwing dagger that could easily be welded in melee as well as as a ranged weapon. When Gargauth manifested an avatar, he carried an infinite supply of these magic daggers. When a Corruptor was thrown, it disappeared and returned to Gargauths avatar the moment it struck the target.
